product_description: Delight your taste-buds with the flavorful taste of Pop Weaver Microwave Popcorn Extra Butter. Pop Weaver's microwave popcorn is made with fresh, natural ingredients and non-GMO kernels. This microwave popcorn is also cholesterol-, gluten- and sugar-free, and contains 0g of trans fat. Pop Weaver is an excellent choice for family occasions and parties, but also casual snacking and much more. Make movie nights even more fun with this Pop Weaver Extra Butter Microwave Popcorn. Excellent for movie nights, game days, children's parties and other at-home occasions. 2.25oz Bag, 22 Bags per Box

name: Jolly Time The Big Cheez, Cheddar Cheese Microwave Popcorn, 3.2oz Sharing Bag, 3 Bags Per Carton (The Big Cheez, 3.2 Ounce (Pack of 12))
short_description: PACK OF 4 BOXES: Each box contains three regular-sized (3.2 ounce) individual bags, for a total of 12 microwave bags. Each bag contains 3 servings that yield 10 cups of popped popcorn. This snack is perfect for on the go or a family movie night!

INCREDIBLE CHEESY FLAVOR ON YUMMY TENDER KERNELS: If you like the taste of white or sharp cheddar, parmesan, or seasoning salt powder on your popcorn, mix it up with the creamy, zesty nacho cheese flavor of The Big Cheez! Each kernel is packed with more fiber and whole grain than traditional cheese snack foods like puffs, balls, macaroni noodles, crackers or crisps
NON-GMO AND GLUTEN FREE: Popping The Big Cheez gives you a great flavor while letting you feel good about yourself! With only 40 calories per cup popped, The Big Cheez will leave you feeling full!
100% WHOLE GRAIN AND KOSHER: Made with natural ingredients, The Big Cheez is the best choice in snacking. Not to mention it has 0 cholesterol and is high in fiber!
MADE in THE USA BY AMERICA'S FIRST BRAND OF POPCORN: Founded in 1914, Jolly Time is a 4th generation family-owned business, and is the longest continuous Good Housekeeping Seal holder

name: Pop Secret Microwave Popcorn, Movie Theater Butter Flavor, 1.75 Oz Snack Bags, (Pack of 12)
product_description: Pop Secret Movie Theater Butter Flavor is your secret to movie night! With a classically rich buttery flavor and airy crunch, this craveable popcorn makes home movie night feel like you’re at the theater, with that familiar aroma and rich flavor. Every kernel is bursting with great taste. Our single-serve microwaveable popcorn bags pop up fast, hot, and delicious. They’re perfect for movie night, TV time or any time you’re craving a buttery-tasting snack. Made with non-GMO kernels, and no artificial preservatives or flavors, everyone can feel good about popping a handful of snack-time fun! Keep this handy 12-count box of Pop Secret Movie Theater Butter Flavor microwave popcorn bags in your pantry for whenever you need an easy snack for movie night, game time, or any time at all! Since 1985, Pop Secret has been serving up warm, buttery-tasting, craveable popcorn snacks that bring everyone together. It’s the secret that’s too good to keep to yourself! Read more

name: Pop Secret Butter Microwave Popcorn 12ct (3.2oz Bags), 38.4oz Box (Pack of 1)
short_description: CLEAN, NON-GMO GOODNESS — Popped from non-GMO whole-grain corn with no artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives, delivering feel-good popcorn that satisfies big cravings while aligning with modern clean-label snacking.\
LIGHT, AIRY CRUNCH — Each kernel pops up fluffy with an irresistible buttery aroma, turning any couch into a cinema seat and balancing indulgent flavor with satisfying texture.
MICROWAVE CONVENIENCE — Every bag pops hot, fresh popcorn in about 3–4 minutes, giving you an effortless, shareable snack for movie night, game day, lunch boxes, or whenever cravings strike.
SIGNATURE BUTTER BALANCE — Light, fluffy kernels seasoned with classic butter and a pinch of salt offer timeless flavor everyone loves, perfect from lunchboxes to late-night cravings.
PANTRY-FRIENDLY 12-CT — A dozen 3.2 oz bags per box keep Pop Secret butter goodness at the ready for parties, unexpected guests, or everyday treats—no last-minute snack runs needed.
product_description: Popcorn fanatics love the delicious buttery taste of Pop Secret Butter Flavor popcorn. What’s our secret for the best popcorn? Kernels popped up light and fluffy with delicious buttery flavor and an aroma that brings the gang together. Ready in minutes, our microwaveable popcorn bags make it easy to pop up a delicious hot popcorn treat. And with 12 individually sized popcorn bags, there are plenty to go around. Pop Secret Butter Flavor microwave popcorn makes a perfect snack. They’re great for movie night, TV time or any time you’re craving a buttery-tasting snack. Made with non-GMO kernels, and no artificial preservatives or flavors, everyone can feel good about popping a handful of snack-time fun! Since 1985, Pop Secret has been serving up warm, craveable popcorn snacks that bring everyone together. It’s the secret that’s too good to keep to yourself!
